AutoAntiAfkDescription: Reset the relevant timer within the game at fixed intervals to prevent being automatically set to AFK state
AutoCACDescription: After interacting with Cuff-A-Cur, automatically and repeatedly play the mini-game.
AutoCancelCastDescription: Auto cancel cast when the target is dead or cannot be selected.
AutoConstantlyInspectDescription: Auto click the "Continue" button when the Item Appraisal Result interface appears
AutoCTSDescription: After interacting with a Crystal Tower Striker game console, auto and repeatedly play the mini-game.
AutoCutsceneSkipDescription: Auto skips all skippable cutscenes, and remove skip restrictions including but not limited to Main Scenario, Ocean Fishing, Crystalline Conflict.
AutoDanceDescription: When using dancer action Standard/Technical Step, the corresponding dance step actions will be automatically used.
AutoDeleteLettersDescription: Open the Moogle Delivery interface, delete all letters in selected category when select a category and click start button.
AutoDesynthesizeItemsDescription:
Auto confirm when the desynthesis interface opened;
Open the desynthesis interface and click start, it'll desynthesis all
AutoDismountDescription: Auto dismount when you are trying to use available actions on mount.
AutoExpertDelivery-ReachdSealCap: The number of seals is about to exceed the upper limit, so submission will be stopped.
AutoExpertDeliveryDescription: Auto finish expert delivery after click start on the supply and provisioning missions interface.
AutoGardensWorkDescription: Auto or semi-auto finish garden related operations, including planting, harvesting, fertilization, care, etc
AutoCommenceDutyDescription: Auto confirm the commencing duty window
AutoInDutySelectYesDescription: Auto select yes when interacting with the duty interactive items
AutoInDutySelectYesTitle: Auto Select Yes In Duty Interactions
AutoLeveQuests-GetAreaLeveData: Obtain Leve Quests in This Area
AutoLeveQuestsDescription: Automatically repeat selected levequest up to max allowances after confirm current settings and click "Start"
AutoLogin-CharaIndexInputTooltip: Under each World, the index of the first character is 0, the second is 1, etc.
AutoLoginDescription: Automatically login to the first login-able character in the settings by priority upon entering main title screen
AutoMarkAetherCurrents-DisplayLeftCurren: You only need to click the button if there are more than 8 aether currents to be displayed
AutoMarkAetherCurrents-ManuallySelectCur: Manually specify the aether current(s) to be displayed
AutoMarkAetherCurrentsDescription: Auto mark aether currents on map, replace the vanilla UI with DR UI, allowing custom display of aether currents and teleport or auto navigation to the designated aether current.
AutoMaterializeDescription: Automatically extracts materia from all the equipment under selected category when you open Materia Creation and click "Start"
AutoRepairDescription: Auto detects the equipped gears durability and repairs them when fall below the set threshold, removing the pre- and post-repair delay restrictions.
AutoMiniCactpotDescription: Auto finish all of today's Mini Cactpot after opening its interface
AutoMJIGather-CollectGatherPointsHelp:
Due to rendering distance limit, for first use, please activate Data Collection Mode here.
Please wait for the module to complete automatic data collection. No need to re-collect data in future use.
AutoMJIGather-InsufficientGatherNodes: Less than 10 gathering points selected, please select more
AutoMJIGather-ReachCapsMessage: Some of island's items have reached the upper limit, and auto collection has been stopped
AutoMJIGather-StopWhenReachCaps: When reach caps, stop gathering and send notification
AutoMJIGatherDescription: Automatically loop gathering Island Sanctuary items after finishing configuration and clicking start
AutoMT-InterruptNotice: Note: Interrupts are only supported between games, to interrupt during the game, please uninstall the module manually
AutoMTDescription: Automatically loop playing Monster Toss after interacting with the game machine
AutoNotifyCutSceneEndDescription: Automatically notifies that all party members' cutscene ended if a party member watches a cutscene for more than 5 seconds in duties
AutoNotifyDutyConfirmDescription: Automatically send a notification when the Duty Confirm window appears
AutoNotifyDutyNameDescription: Auto notifies the duty name when entering duties
AutoNotifyDutyStartDescription: Auto notifies the start of duty when duty starts
AutoNotifyMessagesDescription: Auto notifies when the selected message type comes in or a new message contains a specific keyword
AutoNotifyLeveUpdateDescription: Auto notifies the date that the limit reached when the leve allowances refresh
AutoNotifyLeveUpdate-NotificationTitle: Leve allowances limit reached or is to overflow
AutoNotifyLeveUpdate-FullTimeText: Estimated time to reach the upper limit:
AutoNotifyLeveUpdate-UpdateTimeText: Next Refresh Time of Leve Allowances:
AutoNotifyRecruitmentEndDescription: Auto notifies when the recruitment ends for any reason
AutoNoviceNetwork-TryJoinWhenInactiveHel: When the game is inactive or running in the background, and the current status allows joining the Novice Network, automatically attempt to join the Novice Network at fixed intervals
AutoNoviceNetworkDescription: Auto try to join the Novice Network after clicking "Start"
AutoPlayerCommend-NoticeMessage: Has given a commendation to {0}{1} the{2}
AutoPlayerCommendDescription: Give a commendation to the party member who has the same role or is a tank(healer) when you are a  healer(tank) in dungeons  automatically when the duty has ended.
AutoPreventDuplicateStatusDescription: When corresponding actions are used auto-check status already exist for preventing the supply status overlap.
AutoQTEDescription: In duties, automatically complete all types of Quick Time Event(QTE).
AutoQuestAcceptDescription: Auto clicks the confirm button when the quest access interface appears
AutoQuestCompleteDescription: Auto clicks the confirm button when the quest complete interface appears
AutoRefocusDescription: Auto refocuses the target if the lost focus target appears again in duties
AutoRefreshMarketSearchResultDescription: Auto re-requests when the market board item search result is "Please wait"
AutoRefreshPartyFinderDescription: Auto refreshes the recruitment board at a regular interval after opening it
ExpandItemMenuSearchDescription: Add additional search entry to the item subcommand menu
AutoRemoveArmoireItemsFromDresserDescrip: Auto remove all the gears that can be stored in the armoire from the glamour dresser after open the glamour dresser interface and click start
AutoRemoveArmoireItemsFromDresserTitle: Auto Remove Armoire Items From Glamour Dresser
AutoRequestItemSubmitDescription: Auto select items and complete the submission when submitting items
AutoRetainerWork-Dispatch-Description:
Open the Retainer Vocate market registration list (as the image shows), 
After clicking Start, all retainers will automatically have their market registration changed to the current city.
AutoSellCardsConfirm-CurrentCardNotInDec: The current Triple Triad Card is unclaimed, auto selling has been stopped
AutoSellCardsConfirmDescription:
Auto click confirm button after selling cards' interface appears;
Auto selling all claimed cards after clicking start
AutoRetainerWork-GilsShare-MethodsHelp:
Adjustment Methods:

Method 1:
   Adjust in fixed order. If currency distribution is extremely uneven among retainers, your inventory Gils must be at least half of total retainer Gils
Method 2:
   Withdraw all Gils first then adjust sequentially. Avoid losses due to currency cap
AutoSubmarineCollect-LackSpecificItems: Auto collecting submarines has been stopped because of the insufficient {0}
AutoSubmarineCollectDescription: Auto confirm subaquatic voyages and resend submarines after opening the submarines interface and clicking start
AutoSummonPetDescription: Auto summon pets when entering duty or retrying if you are SMN or SCH
AutoTalkSkipDescription: Automatically skip a dialog when it emerges
AutoTankStance-OnlyAutoStanceWhenOneTank: Only when the party allows at most one tank job

Selecting this option means: When a dungeon allows only one tank job by default, Tank Stance will be used automatically.

Example: (By default)

When entering a Dungeon/Raid, if the party can only have one tank job, Tank Stance will be used automatically.
When entering a Trial/Alliance Raid, if the party can have up to two tank jobs, Tank Stance will not be used automatically.
AutoTankStanceDescription:
If it is currently a protective class, the shield posture is automatically enabled after entering the replica
Auto tank stance when entering duties if you are tank
AutoTMPDescription: Auto repeat Moogle's Paw after interacting with the game machine.
BiggerHDWindowTextDescription: Allows custom IME window scaling and make texts in some windows clearer
ConflictKeyHelp: Some modules use this Interrupt Hotkey setting to interrupt operations
CustomizeSightDistanceDescription: Customize the maximum sight distance allowed by the current game camera.
FastObjectInteract-AllowClickToTarget: Allow click button to select target
FastObjectInteract-BlacklistKeysListInpu: Please enter the keyword,  it requires a perfect match
FastObjectInteract-OnlyDisplayInViewRang: Only display objects in view range
FastObjectInteractDescription: Add an overlay listing nearby interactable objects, allowing quicker interactions through direct clicks
ModulesConfigHelp: Unless you are aware of the potential consequences of your actions, please do not modify the module configuration files
PFPageSizeCustomizeDescription: Allows customization of the number of listings per page in Party Finder, with a maximum of 100 listings per page
QuickChatPanel-SendMessageHelp: Left click to copy, right click to send
QuickChatPanelDescription:
Add a panel for quickly sending/copying preset text, macros, or in-game special icons.  
(Note: Not compatible with Chat 2)
QuickChatPanelTitle-DragHelp: Hold down the Left SHIFT key to drag and adjust the position of messages and macros
Settings-TipMessage1: Don't check same function in other plugins to avoid compatibility problems because a function may be realized by different plugins with different method.
Settings-TipMessage2: 2. If "Prerequisite Module" appears in the module description, it means this module requires the support of the specified module to function properly. Prerequisite modules can be substituted by similar functionalities from other plugins.
Author: Author
AutoEnableAttackDescription: Auto enable Auto-Attack for all jobs when entering combat
ExpandPlayerMenuSearchDescription: Add additional search entries to the player context menu
AutoHolmgangSelfDescription: When using the Warrior action Holmgang, force target self.
ClipboardMultiLineToOneLineDescription: When pasting text in the game, multi-line text is forced to be converted into a single line to facilitate editing and sending.
ClipboardMultiLineToOneLineTitle: Auto Make Pasted Texts Single Line
BetterFollowDescription: Unlocks the game's native follow target limitation, and is able to automatically lock on to the target and re-follow it.
BetterFollow-Status: Follow Status: {0} / Follow Target: {1} / Is Target Around: {2}
BetterFollow-CommandDesc: Force auto-follow on the current selected target
BetterFollow-NvavmeshFollowDesc: Do not disable the vnavmesh plugin while following. Unpredictable consequences may occur when using vnavmesh for following during duties and encountering movement-related effects like knockbacks or immobility
CustomizeGameObjectDescription: Customize the scaling of various in-game entities based on presets
AutoJumboCactpotDescription: Auto finish all of today's Jumbo Cactpot after opening its interface
AutoLogin-LoginInfoOrderHelp: All stored data will be used to attempt login in the order of priority shown in the list below, from top to bottom
Commands-CommandHelp-Search: Open the main interface and search for specific keywords
AutoJoinExitDutyDescription: Add /pdr joinexitduty command for quick join-exit of duty
AutoDiscard-AddNewGroupInputNameHelp: Enter a unique config group name
AutoDiscard-CommandHelp: <Config Group Name> Execute the specified config group
AutoDiscard-NoItemInGroupHelp: No items and go to add
AutoDiscardDescription: Auto discard or sell items in presets
Name: Name
AutoFCWSDeliverDescription: Open the Material Delivery interface and, upon clicking "Start," automatically deliver all available materials
QuickChatPanel-SystemSoundHelp: Left-click to preview, right-click to send
PlayerTargetInfoExpandDescription: Allow customization of the information displayed in the Target Info after selecting a target
BetterBlueSetLoadDescription: Optimized loading of active sets in the Blue Magic Spellbook interface, allowing active sets switching without removing Aetheric Mimicry.
AutoNotifySPPlayers-ExtraCommandInputHin:
The command must start with / and {0} can be used to represent the target player's name.
Multiple commands are supported, one per line.
AutoNotifySPPlayers-NameInputHint: Supports regular expression input (starting with /). Leave this blank to match any player.
AutoNotifySPPlayersDescription: Automatically send an alert and execute custom text commands when pre-specified special player appear
MacroIntoActionQueueDescription: Allow all actions and item usages to be queued
AutoNumericInputMax-InterruptHelp: Pressing the Interrupt Hotkey once will prevent the module from attempting to modify the numeric input value for the next 10 seconds.
AutoNumericInputMaxDescription: Set all number input components to always be at their maximum value
AutoJoinExitDuty-AlreadyInDutyNotice: Error: Already in a duty now
AutoShowDutyGuideDescription: Upon entering a duty, automatically display the instance guide from ff14.org in a overlay
AutoShowDutyGuide-DebugModeHelp: Entering the Debug Mode requires pulling online data, please wait patiently, do not switch on and off frequently.
AutoReplaceLocationActionDescription: Upon entering a duty, automatically redirect the placement of ground-targeted actions to the center of the area
AutoNotifySPPlayers-WorkTheoryHelp: One detection every 3 seconds, maximum of 5 alerts per 5 minutes for a single player
FastResetAllSDEnmityDescription: Resetting enmity from a single Striking Dummy will clear enmity from all dummies, and a command is added for manual clearing
FastResetAllSDEnmityTitle: Fast Reset All Striking Dummy Enmity
AutoShowDutyGuide-TheoryHelp:
Upon entering a duty, the corresponding guide content will be automatically pulled from ff14.org. If no guide is available, the overlay will not be displayed.

You can right-click on a specific section in the overlay to copy the entire content
CustomizeInterfaceTextDescription: Replace and customize all in-game text according to presets saved
AutoCheckItemLevelDescription: Automatically check the item level of all party members after entering a duty and highlight those with abnormal item levels
AutoStoreToCabinet-StoreHelp: Due to network latency, gears stored through the module may take up to 30 seconds to appear in the Armoire. Please be patient
AutoStoreToCabinetDescription: Open the Armoire interface and, upon clicking "Start," automatically store all storable gears into the Armoire
AutoRetainerWorkDescription: Automatically or semi-automatically complete retainer-related tasks, including price adjustment for sales, collecting venture rewards, splitting/retrieving gil, and changing registered city
SoundEffectThrottler-ThrottleHelp: System sound effects can only be played once every {0} milliseconds
SoundEffectThrottlerDescription: Automatically limit the playback frequency of system sound effects (<se.>) based on config
AutoLeveQuests-GetMapLevesFailed: Failed to fetch current territory data, please try again to re-enter
AutoLeveQuests-ObtainHelp: To Obtain (Click Left Button After Selected Target)
InstantReturnDescription: Make the Return function instant with no cast time and remove its cooldown
GlamourPlateApplyCommandDescription: Add the /pdr gpapply <number> (starting from 1) command to quickly switch between the saved Glamour Plates
AutoMarkAetherCurrents-UseLocalMarkHelp: If you need to display to Party Members, uncheck this option and click the 'Refresh Markers' button below. The module will switch to using online markers (assess the risks yourself).
Commands-CommandHelp-Load: Load the specified module (Internal Name Only)
Commands-CommandHelp-Unload: Unload the specified module (Internal Name Only)
BanEscToCancelCastDescription: Pressing the Esc key during casting will no longer interrupt the current casting process
BanEscToCancelCastTitle: Disable Esc Key To Interrupt Casting
CustomizeGameObject-NoTaretNotice: No target currently, please select any valid target
OptimizedInteractionDescription: Optimized game interaction logic by removing interaction restrictions when objects are out of sight, obstructed, positioned too high or low, during character jumps, or while low-altitude flying.
AutoSwitchIMEWhenInputDescription: Automatically force-switch to the specified IME when typing in the in-game input box
AutoReplaceLocationAction-EnableCenterAr: When checked, commands like /ac Sacred Soil <center> can be used to attempt placing any ground-targeted action in the center of the field (independent of the action activation below and can be used separately with this command parameter)
AutoMJIGather-HUDNoFound: Islekeep's Index not found, gathering stopped
AutoUnlockAllOrchestrionsListenDescripti: Auto unlock preview for all orchestrion rolls (marks all rolls as obtained)
AutoSwitchIMEWhenInput-FailFindGameWindo: Failed to get the game window
AutoSwitchIMEWhenInput-InadequateIMEHelp: Only effective if the computer has two or more different language IME installed
AutoLeveQuests-NoLevesHelp: No Leve Quests Available in this Zone
InstantReturn-HookOrigin: Replace the game's native Return action
AutoCheckFoodUsageDescription: Automatically check the status of consumed food, and replenish specific food when the remaining time falls below the threshold
AutoCheckFoodUsage-RefreshThresholdHelp: Automatically consume food when the Well Fed status is missing or its remaining time is below the refresh threshold
PartyFinderFilterDescription: Detect recruiter name or recruitment description based on preset regex to filter specific recruitments and automatically exclude duplicates. Does not apply when the recruitment page is password-protected
PartyFinderFilter-WorkTheoryHelp:
Filter Rules:  
Blacklist: Remove listing if the player or description matches the regex.  
Whitelist: Display listing if the player or description matches the regex.  

(If duplicate descriptions appear, only the first one will be kept)
AutoSubmarineCollect-AddCommandHelp: Teleport to the company workshop and try to harvest submarines
AutoReplaceLocationAction-AdjustDistance: When manually placing, if the position exceeds this distance from the center point, redirection will not be attempted
BetterFateProgressUIDescription: Replace the native game interface with the module interface, enabling instant switching without loading, real-time data updates, and right-click quick teleportation support
AutoSplitStacks-CommandHelp: <Item ID>/<Item Name> Execute the specified saved config set
AutoSplitStacks-Notification-ItemNoFound: No matching items found, stop splitting
AutoSplitStacksDescription: Allow quick item splitting into specified quantities via right-click or preset options
AutoLogin-AddCommandHelp:
1. {0} <Character Index>
    Log in to the character at the specified index on the current world.

2. {1} <World Name> <Character Index>
    Log in to the character at the specified index on the specified world.
AutoLogin-CommandHelp: Login to the character at the specified index on the (current/specified) world
AutoPreserveCollectableDescription: When the confirmation window for gathering items as Collectables appears, auto click confirm
AutoLeaveDutyDescription: Auto exit upon completion of non-blacklisted duties
AutoLeaveDuty-Note: Note: To prevent being stuck in combat, additional methods will be called to assist in exiting. Please ignore the resulting messages
AutoCollectableExchangeDescription: Open the Collectables Submission window, and after clicking start, automatically trade all available Collectables in that category
AutoConfirmMateriaWorkDescription: Auto confirm Materia melding/retrieval/meld request and remove delay restrictions before and after melding
DisableGroundActionAutoFaceDescription: Using ground-targeted actions (e.g., Asylum, Earthly Star) will no longer change the current facing direction
DisableGroundActionAutoFaceTitle: Disable Facing Direction Change for Ground-Targeted Actions
InstantLogoutDescription: Remove all logout/exit restrictions and force return to the title screen/exit the game
AutoExpertDelivery-AutoSwitch: Auto switch to Expert Delivery tab
AutoCheckFoodUsage-NoZoneSelectHelp: If no zone is selected, all zones will be valid
MarkerInPartyList-HidePartyListIndexNumb: Hide Index Number in the Party List
MarkerInPartyListDescription: Display target markers before member names in the party list
MarkerInPartyListTitle: Display Target Markers in Party List
AutoPreventDuplicateStatus-OverlapThresh:
Remaining duration of related status effects:

If above the threshold, action overlap is prohibited
If below the threshold, action overlap is allowed
AutoFateSync-DelayHelp: If this value is not 0, level sync will only occur after the set time has elapsed upon entering a FATE range.
AutoFateSync-IgnoreMountingHelp:
When enabled, auto level sync will not trigger upon entering a FATE range while mounted
However, if you dismount within the FATE range, auto level sync will still occur
AutoFateSyncDescription: Auto level sync when entering a FATE range
BlockInputWhenFishingDescription: During casting, most unrelated key inputs are blocked to prevent accidental interruption of the fishing process
AutoSkipLogoDescription: Auto skip the Logo screen at game startup, taking the client directly to the login screen
Settings-TipMessage3: 3. In case of a game crash, please first check other installed plugins and software. Before providing any feedback, ensure the issue can be consistently reproduced with only Daily Routines enabled.
FastRidePillionDescription: Auto ride pillion when you right-click a party member that is riding a multi-seat mount
AutoRetainerWork-PriceAdjust-CreateNewBa: Create a new config based on this
AutoLeveQuests-NoDelayHelp: Note: While the module is running, target selection and model rotation data are automatically blocked from being uploaded to the server, so there are no delay options
AutoPetFollowDescription: When out of combat, if your summoned entity is present on the field, it will automatically receive a follow command
ExpandActionRangeDescription: Once enabled, expand the range of all Actions by a specified distance
AutoDrawMotifsDescription: If the current job is Pictomancer, automatically use available Motiff actions upon entering or recommencing a duty, or exiting combat
AutoMJIGather-PointNotFound: Gathering point not found, trying to relocate coordinates
InstantLeaveDutyDescription: Remove all duty exit restrictions and forcefully leave the current instance.
DisregardFollowQuestDescription: Ignore the hiding detection relative to the tracked character in Follow Quests
FastTeleportPanel-InaccurateYPosHelp: The destination Y coordinate is not accurate and may need to be manually adjusted after teleport
FastTeleportPanelDescription: Add a Fast Teleport Panel widget for fast teleport to any location within the zone
FastTeleportPanel-WeightHelp: The higher the weight value, the higher the priority in sorting
AutoSoulsowDescription: If current job is Reaper, automatically use Soulsow after: entering or recommencing a duty, or leaving combat
BaitSwitchCommand-CommandHelp: <Item ID / Item Name / Item Name Chinese Pinyin> Switch to the specified bait
BaitSwitchCommand-CommandHelpDetailed:
If you want to switch to the bait "Versatile Lure," you can use the command in following ways:

/pdr bait 29717 (Item ID)
/pdr bait Versatile Lure/Versatile (Item Name)
/pdr bait wannengnier/wanneng (Chinese Pinyin)

Note: Except for the Item ID, all inputs should match the current client language.
BaitSwitchCommand-Notice-FishingNow: Cannot switch bait, it is fishing currently
BaitSwitchCommand-Notice-NoBait: Bait {0} is insufficient in the inventory
BaitSwitchCommandDescription: Add the command /pdr bait <Item ID / Item Name / Item Name Pinyin> to allow switching bait via command.
AutoMarkAetherCurrents-ManualModeHelp: When enabled, you can manually select the specific Aether Currents to display
AutoRestoreFurnitureDescription: Open the Furniture UI and click "Start" to automatically retrieve all storeroom furniture into the inventory/placed furniture into the storeroom
AutoMaterialize-AutoExtractAllHelp: When extracting any gear's materia, extract all.
AutoMaterialize-Notice-NoValidAddon: Cannot find the Materia Extraction interface or there might be an interface data error
AutoMaterialize-Notice-OnMount: Cannot extract now, because you are riding.
AutoDrawMotifs-DrawWhenOutOfCombat: Auto Redraw When Out of Combat
Settings-NeedConnectToAuthServer: Please connect to the authentication server first
Settings-NeedLoginToAnyCharacter: Please log in to any character first
AutoMateriaRetriveDescription: When retrieving any gear's materia, retrieve all.
AutoNumericInputMax-AdjustMax: Modify the store's single purchase limit
AutoNumericInputMax-AdjustMaxHelp: Once enabled, the item limit of 99 is changed to 999
Settings-TranslationUpdatedMessage: Downloaded the translated text from the cloud and updated it
AutoNotifyReadyCheckDescription: Automatically send notification reminders when a readiness confirmation is received
ExpandItemMenuSearch-GlamourTakesPriorit: Search for glamour items first when searching for equipments
AutoBlockSystemNoticeDescription: Automatically block system notifications sent within the game (Purple Word Bulletin)
BetterCommandInputDescription: Automatically converts incorrect case and full/half-case commands to correct commands when entering commands.
AutoUnlockAllContentsDescription: Mark all duties as unlocked to directly view corresponding information in the Party Finder or Duty Finder.
DisplayTargetHPDescription: In the Target bar and Focus Target bar, display the exact HP of the respective targets according to the selected format
LiveAnonymousModeDescription:
Obfuscate all player names and models in the game to encrypt gameplay information.
(This is not an actual modification and does not affect non-model-related plugins, but be aware that other plugin interfaces may still reveal information.)
AutoNumericInputMax-MaxValueInputHelp: Please notice that if you set an excessive maximum value( 999), the game will be stuck.
AutoUseEventItemDescription: When interacting with objects that require quest items and opening the Key Item inventory, automatically use the corresponding quest item
DisplayTargetHP-ZeroAlphaHelp: If the opacity ( value) is set to 0, the custom color will not be used.
AutoManageInterruptActionDescription: If the current target is not casting an interruptible action, prevent the use of interrupt actions (e.g., Interject, Head Graze)
WorldTravelCommandDescription: Add /pdr worldtravel <world> (case insensitive/partial match) command for quick World Travel from any location within the three main cities
WorldTravelCommand-CommandHelp:
Toggle World Travel menu 
/pdr worldtravel <WorldName> (Case Insensitive/Partial Match)
WorldTravelCommand-Notice-InvalidInput: Invalid input parameters, please check and try again
WorldTravelCommand-Notice-SameWorld: The target world is the same as the current world
AutoPlayerCommend-AssignPlayerCommendMes: {0}@{1} has been designated as the best player in this round
AutoPlayerCommend-ErrorWhenGiveCommendat: Unable to auto give commendation, game data is incorrect or corrupted
FCMemberManagePanelDescription: Add a new window to the FC Member UI for quick search, sorting, and batch operations on members
Settings-Auth-Step0-1: Please read and agree to the following Terms of Use before using this plugin:
Settings-Auth-Step2-1:
This plugin is free.
It has never been authorized for sale by anyone, in any form, on any platform.
We do not tolerate any reselling disguised as "tutorials" or "compiling materials."
Settings-Auth-Step3-3: What credentials should be selected for authentication when playing with multiple machines but only one account
Settings-Auth-Step3-2: Please join the server using the button above and answer the following questions:
Settings-Auth-Step3-4: 2. How many days is the validity period for a single verification for common users?
Settings-Auth-Step3-5: 3. What should you send to the bot to enter verification mode?
Settings-Auth-Step3-7: Invalid answer detected, please check and try again.
Settings-Auth-Step4-1:
Please be aware of the following:

1. This plugin is considered a game cheat in various categories and contexts.
2. This plugin includes modules and functions that actively interact with the game server.
3. The intention of this plugin is to make the game more enjoyable and relaxing, not to cause disputes.
4. This plugin is not responsible for any potential consequences arising from its use. Please game responsibly.
Settings-Auth-Step4-2: I have read and agree to all the above
Settings-BlacklistedNotice: You have been blacklisted and cannot use Daily Routines.
AutoRequestNecessityDescription: Auto request data, including but not limited to Glamours, Portraits, Armoire, Inventory, and Achievements upon login to reduce loading times when opening various UI
AutoClaimPVPRewardsDescription: Auto claim all pending series rewards after open Series Malmstones UI and click start
AutoRepair-RepairNotice: Detected gear durability below threshold, preparing to repair.
AutoShopPurchaseDescription: Auto purchase items from the specified shop list after config setup and clicking start
AutoShopPurchase-Exception-PresetAddonIn: Preset addon is invalid or not fully loaded.
AutoShopPurchase-Exception-PresetNodeInv: Preset nodes are invalid or not fully loaded.
AutoShopPurchase-Exception-PresetTargetI: Current target does not match the preset target.
AutoShopPurchase-Tooltip-EmptyTargetInpu:
If left blank, the current target name will not be checked during execution.
If not blank, it will only execute if the target name matches exactly.
AutoCutsceneSkip-WorkModeHelp:
Whitelist: Skip cutscenes only if the current area is whitelisted
Blacklist: Skip cutscenes only if the current area is not blacklisted
AutoSpeedMultiplierDescription: Add /pdrspeed <multiplier> to permanently adjust player speed multiplier
AutoConstantlyClickDescription: Holding down any hotbar key will automatically switch to rapid repeated presses of that key
InstantTeleportDescription: Make teleport instant, no cast time
PermanentDisconnectStatusDescription: Keep the online status as 'Disconnected' permanently (without affecting other operations)
AutoAntiKnockback-CommandKBHelp: <Internal Method Name> Switch the Method (partial match/case-insensitive).
AutoAntiKnockback-CommandReplayHelp: Repeat the last forced movement encountered.
AutoAntiKnockback-CommandReplayNotificat: Repeated the last forced movement (Angle: {0} / Distance: {1}).
AutoAntiKnockback-KnockbackNotification:
Forced movement detected (Angle: {0} / Distance: {1})  
Method applied: {2}.
AutoAntiKnockback-MethodDesc-AdjustDista: Adjust the actual displacement distance according to the set coefficient (e.g., if set to 0.5 and the original knockback distance is 20, the final knockback distance will be 10)
AutoAntiKnockback-MethodDesc-FastInPlace: Shorten the forced movement completion time to 0.5 seconds.
AutoAntiKnockback-MethodDesc-InstantInPl: Instantly reach the knockback position during forced movement.
AutoAntiKnockback-MethodDesc-NoMove: Nullify the effects of forced movement on yourself.
AutoAntiKnockback-MethodDesc-Reverse: Reverse all forced movements affecting yourself (e.g., pull effects become push effects).
AutoAntiKnockbackDescription: Automatically apply the selected logic to handle forced movements like knockback/pull when encountered
Settings-PremiumCredentialHelp: This feature is an internal testing channel, unrelated to sponsorship, and not open to the public
Settings-Auth-Notice-RefreshingAuthCloud:
Refreshing cloud information. You may be temporarily redirected to the user agreement page; please wait up to 15 seconds.  
If it remains ineffective after refreshing, please check your local network settings.
Settings-Auth-Notice-UploadingTOU:
Uploading TOU result. Please wait for up to 15 seconds.  
If you are still stuck on the user agreement page after waiting, please check your local network settings.
ProhibitSwimmingDescription: Automatically prevents the character from entering the swimming state in swimmable areas, allowing the character to run on water and use actions
FastTeleportPanel-CommandHelp-Custom: <Custom Marker Name> Teleport to the specified custom point
FastTeleportPanel-CommandHelp-Main: Fast Teleport Panel Commands. See module settings for details
FastTeleportPanel-CommandHelp-Mouse: Teleport to the location pointed by the mouse in-game
FastTeleportPanel-CommandHelp-PosOffset: <x/y/z> <Offset> Offset a specified distance along the chosen axis
FastTeleportPanel-CommandHelp-Quest: <Quest Index> Teleport and interact with the specified quest target
ProhibitMountFlightRestrctionDescription: Prevent the application of 'Hoofing It' debuff and 'No Aether Currents Beyond This Point' restriction (e.g., inside Island Sanctuary buildings)
ProhibitMountFlightRestrctionTitle: Remove Hoofing It & No Aether Current Beyond This Point Limitation
AutoGathererRoleActionsDescription: Automatically use abilities from other gathering classes when switching to any gathering class
AutoHideNeedlessPopupsDescription: Automatically hide unnecessary popups such as Near-complete Achievements, Fellowship Notifications, Playguide, Recommended Duties, and Active Help
NoUIFadeDescription: Disable in-game black screens and fade-ins/outs used for transitions to reduce unnecessary waiting time during loading
AutoAdventureDescription: After clicking start, automatically complete all Sightseeing Log allowed under the current time/weather
FastFreeCompanyChestDescription: After opening the Free Company chest, automatically request all page data, significantly reduce operation lock time, and remove quantity confirmation when storing or retrieving items
QueueCombatTeleportDescription: Remove the restriction on opening the teleport menu during combat, store teleport requests made during combat, and automatically teleport the moment combat ends
WorldTravelCommand-AutoLeavePartyHelp: Auto leave non-cross-world party when executing world travel
AutoUnlockExpertDeliveryDescription: Ignoring rank requirements, directly unlock the Expert Delivery feature after joining any Grand Company
RealQueuePositionDescription: When using the Duty Finder or World Travel, automatically show the real queue position when there are more than 50 players
AutoOpenMapLinksTitle: Auto Open Map Link in Chat
AutoOpenMapLinksDescription: After configuration, automatically open the map link when the specified player sends or the specified chat type receives it
AutoOpenMapLinks-ClickMenu: Auto open the map link sent by this
AutoSendMoneyDescription: After configuration, automatically trade the specified amount of gils in bulk with the designated targets
AutoSendMoney-NoPlan: Trade completed, but the corresponding trade plan was not found
AutoReplaceActionLowLevelDescription: When higher-level actions become unusable due to level sync, automatically replace them with their lower-level counterparts
IgnoreActionTargetBlockedDescription: Ignore the game's internal detection mechanism that prevents action use due to the target being obstructed when casting
InstantPlaceLocationActionDescription: Automatically and instantly cast ground-targeted action at the mouse pointer without requiring further confirmation
LimitlessTargetDashActionDescription: Allow dash actions that require a target to ignore distance limits and be able to execute instantly upon selecting a target
FastTeleportPanel-CommandHelp-Flag: Teleport to the flag marker location
AutoThrottleTenChiJin-DisableOtherAction: Disable other actions during weaving Shinobi
AutoThrottleTenChiJinDescription: When weaving Shinobi, each Shinobi action can only be pressed once during the sequence.
FasterTerritoryTransportDescription: Speed up all in-zone loading to reduce character disable time during loading
AutoOpenMapLinks-AutoFocusFlag: Place the flag only, no map refreshing
AutoActionAlignCameraDescription: Make some actions always cast in the current camera direction
AutoActionAlignCameraTitle: Auto Force Actions To The Camera Direction
AutoSnipeQuestDescription: Auto avoid and change snipe quests into completed when starting snipe quests.
AutoFaceCameraDirection-WorkModeFalse: When holding interrupt hotkey, no longer force your character's direction same with camera.
AutoFaceCameraDirection-WorkModeTrue: Only when holding interrupt hotkey,  the game character's direction will be aligned with the camera.
AutoFaceCameraDirectionDescription: Always align the game character's orientation with the current camera orientation
AutoFaceCameraDirectionTitle: Auto Orient To The Camera Direction
InstanceZoneChangeCommand-Notice-NoInsta: No Instance Zones in this territory
InstanceZoneChangeCommand-TeleportIfNotN: If there is no Aetheryte nearby, teleport to the nearest Aetheryte first.
InstanceZoneChangeCommandDescription: Add the /pdr insc command to quickly switch between instances if the Aetheryte in any of the instances can be selected.
AutoRedirectDashActionsDescription: Automatically redirects the destination of some displacement skills to the current mouse pointer.
Commands-CommandHelp-Toggle: Toggle Specific Module(only support internal module name)
AutoMarksFinderDescription: Auto scan and organize hunt mobs info into a list after configuring.
AutoMarksFinder-NewTrainListTip: Create a new train list. Press 'Enter' to confirm.
AutoMarksFinder-NoRunningScanner: There is no running scanner atm.
AutoMarksFinder-CantSortNullStartingPoin: Can't sort due to no starting point.
AutoMarksFinder-DetectPowerfulMark: Found Lv.{0} Notorious Monster: {1} at location {2:F2}
InstantDismountDescription: Upon attempting to dismount, immediately step down to the ground.
PartyFinderSettingRecordDescription: Persistently save the recruitment details filled in the interface, and automatically populate them the next time the interface is opened
InvulnerableModeDescription: Add /pdr invulnerable command. This command allows User to become invulnerable to attacks.
AutoFateStartDescription: If there is a nearby FATE that requires dialogue to start, automatically initiate it.
AutoMateriaTransmutation-BlacklistMateri: Materia prohibited from being used for transmutation.
AutoMateriaTransmutationDescription: Open the Materia Transmutation interface, and after clicking Start, automatically select and transmute Materia.
MoveableDeathStateDescription: Allow the current character to move normally even when in a dead state.
ExpandTargetRadiusDescription: After configuration, expand the target radius by the specified range beyond its original size.
NoFallDamageDescription:
Prevent fall damage
(When enabled, character jump and fall animations will be disabled)
Settings-Auth-FailContactingServer: Failed to get auth info. Please check your local network settings.
NoHideHotbarsDescription: No longer hide some UI(e.g. hotbars) because of special operations automatically.
AutoMarksFinder-HelpMessage:
Open Auto Hunt Mobs Finder UI
/pdrmf conduct  Open Mini UI
AutoChakraFormShiftDescription: If the current job is MNK, automatically use Steeled/Forbidden Meditation and Form Shift upon entering a Duty, triggering a Retry, or exiting Combat.
CustomizeSightDistance-ManualFoVInput: Manually adjust the field of view
FasterTerritoryTransport-OnlyLocalHelp:
If this option on, only the role movement restriction for the local client will be lifted, and no notification packets will be sent to the server that the zone load has been completed

Take the scenario of passing through the map and moving continuously within a copy as an example:
Option on: After the loading complete, it appears to others that you appear in the current position by fading out
Option off: It seems to others that you have finished loading in an instant and moved to your current position normally
FastTeleportPanel-CommandHelp-Ground: Try detecting the ground above and below, and teleport to the ground position
FastTeleportPanel-CommandHelp-Aetheryte: Attune to interact with any nearby available Aetheryte or Aethernet within the city
DailyModuleBase-Exported: Configuration has been successfully exported to the clipboard.
DailyModuleBase-ExportError: Failed to export config to the clipboard
DailyModuleBase-Imported: Configuration has been successfully imported from the clipboard.
DailyModuleBase-ImportError: An error occurred while attempting to import the configuration from the clipboard.
AutoHighlightFlagMarkerDescription: When placing a flag, automatically use Waymarks to create a light pillar to highlight the destination.
AutoHighlightFlagMarker-ConstantlyUpdate: Continuously update the position of the light pillar.
AutoMarksFinder-RelayArgsHelp:
{0} - Coordinates of the NM's location
{1} - Name of the Notorious Monster 
{2} - Instance of the NM's location (e.g., 'Instance 1') (This will be empty if no instance exists)
AutoWoofDescription: Auto constantly Bark when mounted on Megashiba
InstantTeleport-DelayHelp:
Delay represents the interval between: local teleport request sent and local cast completion request sent
If you frequently experience teleport casting bars or failed teleports,
please adjust this delay manually based on your network conditions after confirming no other plugin interference
BetterWaitCommandDescription: Remove native time and precision limits for "wait" in text commands
AutoRetainerWork-Collect-AutoCollect: Auto collect when retainer list opens
ContentFinderCommand-ArgsHelp:
Except for <Duty Type> all parameters support using "|" as separator to combine multiple options
Example: /pdrduty n Tribute|Emanation unrest|minil
Means: Queue for The Pool of Tribute and Emanation with unrestricted party and minimum item level
ContentFinderCommand-CommandHelp: <Duty Type> <Duty ID / Duty Name> (<Content Finder Settings>)
ContentFinderCommandDescription: Added /pdrduty command for quickly joining specific duties or roulettes
AutoRefuseTrade-Notification: Trade request received and automatically declined
AutoRefuseTradeDescription: Automatically decline trade requests, send notification messages and execute additional custom text commands when receiving trade requests
AutoUseItemStacksDescription: Add right-click menu option for batch-using stackable items if they are usable
NoClipModeDescription: Disable all in-game collision detection, allowing character movement without being blocked by terrain or obstacles
Commands-CommandHelp-Notify: Send specified text using Dalamud notification service
Commands-CommandHelp-TTS: Read specified text using built-in TTS settings
AutoCountPlayersDescription: Display number of nearby players in server info bar, with a searchable overlay
AutoRetainerWork-PriceAdjust-RequestMark: Failed to fetch market data, attempting to retrieve again
AutoLeaveDuty-NoLeaveHighEndDuties: Don't auto leave raids of the current version
AutoLeaveDuty-NoLeaveHighEndDutiesHelp: All duties classified as "High-End Duty" in current party finder categories
InstanceZoneChangeCommand-DtrEntryToolti: Click to Open Instance Switching Overlay
AutoRetainerWork-PriceAdjust-AdjustUnitP: Click to auto adjust prices for all same items under current retainer
RightClickToMoveModeDescription: Enable moving to target location by right-clicking the ground
RightClickToMoveMode-RightClickMode-Desc: Triggers movement when right mouse button is pressed
RightClickToMoveMode-LeftRightClickMode-: Trigger movement when both mouse buttons are pressed
RightClickToMoveMode-KeyRightClickMode-T: Trigger movement when holding key and right-clicking
AutoSellCardsConfirm-CommandHelp: Auto go to and open Card Buyer UI, and start to sell back your cards
AutoImmunizeInputDisableDescription: Automatically nullify conditions or status effects that disable input
AutoPetFollow-Notification: Your pet starts to Follow again
CustomActionQueueTimeDescription: Customize the queue time for default and specific actions in the skill queue (time before next GCD)
PetSizeContextMenuDescription: Add size adjustment options to summoner's pet right-click menu
AutoRepeatChatMessageDescription: Add a following button {0} to every message in chat, in order to quickly repeat the message.
AutoRepeatChatMessage-AutoSwitchChannel: Auto switch to the corresponding channel when repeating
AutoRepeatChatMessage-ColorAble: After clicking, send message to the same channel
AutoRepeatChatMessage-ColorUnable: After clicking, send message to current channel
AutoRepeatChatMessage-AutoSwitchOrigChan: After repeating, switch back to the original channel
AutoRetargetDescription: After configuration, automatically retarget when the current player has no target
AutoRetarget-UseMarkerTrack: Put a Marker Beam to track the target
AutoRepeatChatMessage-UseTrigger: Works only when pressing Conflict key (to avoid mistakenly touch)
MultiTargetTrackerDescription: After configuration, continuously track multiple active players' positions using field markers and record historical data
WorldTravelCommand-DtrEntryTooltip: Click to open the Quick World Visit Menu.
FieldEntryCommandDescription: Added {0} <Parameter/Instance Name> (Case insensitive / Partial match for the latter), to enter specified field operation
FieldEntryCommand-CommandHelp: <Parameter/Instance Name> (Case insensitive / Partial match for the latter) Enter specified field operation
WorldTravelCommand-AddDtrEntry: Add World Travel Entry in DTR Bar
NoRenderWhenBackgroundDescription: When game is in background, disable rendering to reduce idle resource usage and power consumption (does not affect any game functions except visuals)
AutoImmunizeForceMoveDescription: Automatically nullify walking-based forced movement status effects on self
AutoBlockStatusDescription: After configuration, automatically block client-side reception and processing of specified status effects
MultiTargetTracker-TempTrackHelp: Note: Temporary tracking will be cleared after changing areas, while permanent configuration remains active until manually removed
AutoRetarget-PrioritizeForlorn: Prioritize targeting the Forlorn and Forlorn maiden (even if other targets are selected)
NoRenderWhenBackground-OnlyProhibitedInI: Only disable rendering when minimized (only applies to {0})
AutoCancelGatherAnimationDescription: Cancel related action animations during gathering to improve gathering speed.
InstanceZoneChangeCommand-AddDtrEntry: Add Instance Zone Change Entry in DTR Bar
InstanceZoneChangeCommand-CloseAfterUsag: Auto close the overlay after use.
FastCustomDeliveriesInfoDescription: Optimize the custom deliveries interface to display clients with increased rewards this week and add quick action options, such as teleportation, for these clients.
AutoRequestFriendsOnlineStatusDescriptio: Automatically request the online status of all friends when opening the friend list.
AutoEliminateFishAwarenessDescription: After configuration, if an alert appears in the current fishing spot, switch zones to clear the alert and cast again at the same location
AutoEliminateFishAwareness-ExtraCommands: Commands entered here will execute after switching zones and casting again
AutoRepair-AllowNPCRepairHelp:
When checked, if equipped items cannot be fully repaired by yourself 
(e.g., insufficient crafting class level or dark matter), 
nearby repairable NPCs will be automatically searched, and gils will be used for repairs.
AutoMoveGearsNotInSetTitle: Auto Retrieve Gears Not In Any Set
AutoMoveGearsNotInSetDescription: Automatically retrieve all gears not included in any valid set from the Armory Chest after use
AutoMoveGearsNotInSet-CommandHelp: Retrieve all gears not included in any valid set from the Armory Chest
AutoMoveGearsNotInSet-Notification: Retrieved {0} items from the Armory Chest
AutoBroadcastActionHitInfoTitle: Auto Report Actions Critical & Direct Hits
AutoBroadcastActionHitInfoDescription: Automatically use content hint and TTS to report specified action crit/direct hit info after configuration
InstanceZoneChangeCommand-CommandHelp:
Toggle the Quick Instance Switch menu display state
/pdr insc <Instance ID>  Switch to the specified instance (starting from 1)
/pdr insc abort  Abort the current instance switch task
Commands-CommandHelp-FavOn: Load all modules in the favorite
Commands-CommandHelp-FavOff: Unload all modules in the favorite
AutoPelotonDescription: If the current class/job is a physical ranged DPS, Peloton will automatically be executed while moving.
AutoCountBlacklistedTitle: Auto Count Players In Blacklist Nearby
AutoCountBlacklistedDescription: Display the number of players in Blacklist within the set range in the server information bar.
AutoVerEasyQuestBattleTitle: Auto commence the easiest quest combat
AutoVerEasyQuestBattleDescription: While commencing a single-player quest combat, commence with the difficulty Very Easy.
AutoMovePetPositionDescription: After configuring and entering an eight-player duty, if there is a Pet summoned by the user, the Pet will automatically move according to the positions set in the timeline.
AutoMovePetPosition-GetMouseHelp: After clicking, move the mouse to the target position and confirm with Ctrl + Alt.
AutoSortItemsDescription: After configurations, the items in the inventory and armoury will be automatically sorted according to the preset rules while switching zones.
AutoSortItems-ArmouryCategoryDesc: In descending order: crafter and gatherer equipment first, combat equipment last
AutoSortItems-InventoryCategoryDesc: In descending order: craft and gather of materials > materia > medicines and meals > miscellany
AutoSortItems-InventoryTabDesc: In the case of paging: equipment is on a separate page, and other items are on a separate page
ASTHelperDescription: After configurations, if the current job is Astrologer, some actions would be optimized according to the settings.
ASTHelper-AutoPlayCardDescription: When using skill {0}, if the current target is the sky or an enemy, the skill will be automatically redirected according to the rules.
ASTHelper-AutoPlayCard-CommonDescription: Based on the DPS abilities of the job in the current version
ASTHelper-AutoPlayCard-AdvanceDescriptio: Based on nDPS values recorded by Party members in FFLogs
ASTHealer-AutoPlayCard-AdvanceFallback: Unable to connect to FFLogs. Return to normal mode
ASTHelper-EasyHealDescription: Redirect your single healing skill to a valid target according to the rule, if the current target is empty or an enemy.
ASTHelper-EasyHeal-EnableDescription: Based on the HP percentage of party members
ASTHelper-EasyHeal-HealThresholdHelp: If no teammate's HP is below the threshold, casting of the according skill will be blocked.
ASTHelper-EasyHeal-OverhealWarning: Warning: Current threshold is too high which may lead to overheal.
ASTHelper-DuringTestDescription: This is a work-in-progress algorithm, feel free to discuss better solutions in Discord!
ASTHelper-MarkOnPartyList: Display mark next to Party list
FriendlistTeleporterTitle: Right-Click To Teleport In Friend List
FriendlistTeleporterDescription: Right-click a friend in Friend List to quickly teleport to the zone or the server the friend is currently in by a menu option.
FriendlistTeleporter-MenuItemTeleport: Teleport to the area where your friend is.
FriendlistTeleporter-MenuItemCrossWorld: Go to the server where your friend is
IgnoreTurnAndLookAtWaitTitle: Auto cancel waiting of NPC turn and look
IgnoreTurnAndLookAtWaitDescription: Cancel the waiting time of NPC turning and sight adjusting while interacting with NPCs if the user isn't within a certain angle in front of NPCs.
RealQueuePosition-ETA: Current waiting time: {0} / Estimated remaining time: {1}
IgnoreTransparencyWaitTitle: Auto cancel waiting of NPC fade-in and fade-out
IgnoreTransparencyWaitDescription: Cancel the waiting time of NPC fading in and fading out while talking with NPCs.
AutoCancelNPCEmoteDescription: Auto cancel NPC emotes and the waiting time they caused during cutscenes.
BetterStatusTimeDisplayDescription: After configurations, the remaining time of status with long durations will be displayed in the selected format.
AutoAddChatPrefixSuffixTitle: Auto add chat prefixes and suffixes
AutoAddChatPrefixSuffixDescription: After configurations, given prefixes or suffixes would be automatically added to chat messages while they're sent.
FastBLUSpellbookSearchBarTitle: Quick search bar of Blue Magic Spellbook
FastBLUSpellbookSearchBarDescription: Add a quick search bar to the upper left corner of Blue Magic Spellbook, to search in real time based on action names.
ChineseNumericalNotationTitle: Display Numbers In Chinese Numerical Notations
ChineseNumericalNotationDescription: Display numbers in units of ten thousand "wan" and one hundred million "yi" and separate the numbers by ten thousands instead of thousand according to Chinese custom.
AutoRemoveWalkableCastingActionSpeedPena: Auto remove speed penalties of walking cast actions
Remove the speed reduction while executing the actions which allow players to walk during casting the actions.
AutoBlockMisdirectionStateDescription: Automatically block the status with limited direction controls (like Temporary Misdirection or Spinning) and invalidate related processing logic.
AutoImmunizeJumpRestrictionDescription: When the user is given a jump restriction by a status or the zone, the module will automatically make the user immune to it and remove related restrictions.
AutoImmunizeThinIceDescription: When the user is given a status similar to Thin Ice, the module will automatically make the user immune to it and remove related effects.
AutoRemoveStatusSpeedPenaltyTitle: Auto immune to speed penalties from status
AutoRemoveStatusSpeedPenaltyDescription: When the user is given a status which could slow the user down, the module will automatically make the user immune to the speed penalties caused by the status.
OptimizedLongCastTimeActionTitle: Optimize Actions With Long Cast Time
OptimizedLongCastTimeActionDescription: If the cast time of an action is greater than or equal to its recast time, automatically shorten the cast time by {0} seconds.
FrontlinePlayerRadarDescription: After entering Frontline, the location of all players could be detected nearby would be marked and displayed on the screen.
FrontlinePlayerRadar-HideFriendlyCharact: Do not display ally character information
AutoNotifyBonusFateDescription: After entering zones of 4.0 or later, while a FATE with bonus appears, a notification will be automatically sent to remind.
OptimiziedEnemyListDescription: Optimize the enmity list, so that it could display more information of enemy targets like HP, enmity and cast in the form of original game elements.
OptimiziedEnemyList-CastInfoDisplayTarge: Enter target name, exact match required
AutoBlockShutdownFromLobbyErrorTitle: Auto prevent game exiting from lobby errors
AutoBlockShutdownFromLobbyErrorDescripti: While encountering a lobby error, the module will automatically prevent game exiting. Instead, it will return to the login page.
AutoOpenTreasuresDescription: After entering a duty, try to open all the available treasure coffers around automatically.
HullbreakerIsleHelperDescription: After entering the duty Hullbreaker Isle, automatically mark all the iron leg traps on the ground and all the mimics that need to be contacted.
BrayfloxsLongstopHelperDescription: After entering the duty Brayflox's Longstop, automatically talk with the goblin pathfinder and get the Runstop Headgate key.
SastashaHelperDescription: After entering the duty Sastasha, automatically acquire the colour given by the bloody memo and highlight the correct coral.
NeverreapHelperDescription: After entering the duty Neverreap, automatically talk with Tonu Vanu and get the thunder eggs.
AutoMovePetCenterTitle: Auto move the Pet to the center
AutoMovePetCenterDescription: After summoning a creature in a duty or after entering a duty, automatically move the Pet to the center of the current zone.
ShopDisplayRealItemIconTitle: Display Actual Item Icon In Shops
ShopDisplayRealItemIconDescription: The category icons in front of entries will automatically be replaced by actual item icons in shop interfaces.
AutoSkipBuddyFeedSceneTitle: Auto skip cutscenes of feeding Chocobo
AutoSkipBuddyFeedSceneDescription: While feeding your companion in the Chocobo stable, automatically skip the cutscenes and complete the feeding immediately.
AutoConfirmPortraitUpdateDescription: When the portrait update preview interface appears, click OK automatically to update the portrait to the latest equipment status.
AutoConfirmPortraitUpdate-Notification: Portrait updated to latest equipment status
AutoFaceCameraDirection-CommandHelp:
< Type > < Value > Adjust and lock the current character's orientation until manually canceled
{0} off  cancel facing lock
AutoAttireItemsTitle: Auto Process Items In Gear Sets
AutoAttireItemsDescription: After opening the Glamour Dresser and clicking Start, all items in the Glamour Dresser that can be stored as a set will be automatically taken out, and when the Outfit Glamour interface appears, the available equipment will be automatically selected and saved as a set.
AutoGysahlGreensDescription: If you are currently outside the city area and your chocobo partner has not been summoned or the remaining time is less than 5 minutes, you will automatically use Gysahl Greens.
AutoGysahlGreens-NotificationMessage: The Gysahl Greens are running low, so please replenish them.
AutoUseCrafterGathererManualDescription: If the current job is crafter and gatherer, is not at max level, holds any valid survival science/engineering manual, and does not have the corresponding experience bonus effect, the corresponding manual item will be automatically used
AutoReplaceLowBlowWithInterjectDescripti: If the current target is chanting an interruptible skill and Interject is available, replace Low Blow with Interject in the Hotbar.
AutoGysahlGreens-NotBattleJobUsingGys: Use the Gysahl Greens even for non-battle jobs
TargetDashActionNoMoveDescription: Disable movement of the character when executing a gap closer action.
WeeklyBingoClickToOpenTitle: Jump To Duties In Wondrous Tails
WeeklyBingoClickToOpenDescription: Allow to jump to the corresponding duties in the interface of Wondrous Tails.
AutoRecommendFauxHollowsDescription:
When you open the Faux Hollows interface, the current optimal solution will be highlighted automatically according to your settings.
(Highlight color: Blue  Twin Swords / Pink  Treasure Box, Gift Box / Gold  Faux)
AutoReuseEmote-CommandHelp: <Emote Name/Command> (<Interval (ms)>) to repeat an emote with the given interval (2000ms by default).
FastContentsFinderRegisterDescription: Add shortcut buttons for each duty in Duty Finder, allowing users to join duties with prefabricated Duty Finder Settings.
FastContentsFinderRegister-HoldConflictK: Press and hold the interrupt hotkey to toggle
AutoFateSync-AutoTankStance: Activate defence stance when the job is a tank
FastGrandCompanyExchangeTitle: Quick Exchange Company Seals for Items
FastGrandCompanyExchangeDescription: Added a quick exchange floating window in the Company Seals Exchange interface, so you can instantly exchange it for the corresponding item by entering the item name directly.
FastGrandCompanyExchange-CommandHelp: <Item name (case insensitive)> (< Quantity >) Exchange the specified quantity of the specified item in the Company SealsExchange (If the item name is "default", the relevant configuration in the floating window is used directly, and there is no need to enter the quantity)
